# [Interview #618: West Jordan Signing Report - 17th Shard, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=618#15)

#### Question

Do you have a sequel for
*Warbreaker*
in the works?

#### Brandon Sanderson

*Warbreaker*
was a side-project and so... the Wheel of Time has dominated a lot of my time recently, and so, eventually yes.
